summary: A blind teacher breaks the rules to help a female student rediscover the pleasures of life.
cast: Edward Hogg|Alexandra Maria Lara|Melchior Derouet|Francis Frappat|João Lagarto|Alix Planco|António Rolo|Cláudia Soares|Denilson Gomes|Ellie Wallwork|Grace Whitford|Jason Monero|Jonathan Delalonde|Josua Black|Lucy Hogan|Maya Al-Kadri|Sérgio Neves|Sofia Santos|Temi Abiloye|Tiago Oliveira|Tom Barton|Figueira Cid|Maria João Vaz|Pablo Malter|Teresa Madruga|Filipe Duarte|Luís Lucas|David Atrakchi|Luís Esparteiro|Patricia Piseiro|Frank T. London|Sandra Oliveira|Stella Dias|Anderson Freitas|Carlos Curto|Crista Alfaiate|Jorge Mergulhão|Joaquim Soares|Carlos Santos|Rafal Guzniczak
title: Imagine
